response.job_title: Agricultural Engineer. Master's degree in Agricultural Economics and Management
response.summary:
I am an Agricultural Engineer with a master's degree in Agricultural Economics and Management from the Southwest University (China). I have two years of experience in hydraulic design and automation of irrigation systems, as well as in the development of important agricultural projects in a multinational company in charge of selling, distributing, and designing innovative solutions for the agriculture sector.

I have experience in the research field with my last work bring off in an important government research institute in Colombia (AGROSAVIA) and the bachelor’s internship accomplished in CIAT (Centro Internacional de Agricultura Tropical). Additionally, I have participated in symposiums, and I have a publication in a scientific journal for the work carried out in a hotbed of research at Universidad Nacional de Colombia during my bachelor’s degree . Currently I have two papers in peer review.
response.skills: Sustainability, Agriculture, Evaluations, Laboratory Skills, R (Programming Language), Data Analysis, Databases, ArcGIS Desktop, EPANET, Design, AutoCAD, Budget Management, Technical Support, Customer Support, Research and Development (R&D), Agricultural Research, Irrigation Design, Irrigation Management, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel

company.name: Fundación Universitaria de San Gil - Unisangil

profile_positions.title: Profesor tiempo completo

company.name: AGROSAVIA - Corporación colombiana de investigación agropecuaria

profile_positions.company: AGROSAVIA - Corporación colombiana de investigación agropecuaria
profile_positions.description:
Research support professional carrying out activities such as:
• To participate in the organization of the operational activities of the experiments.
• To participate in the processes of ideation and formulation of R + D + i initiatives, documentation and linking of technological offers.
• To consolidate the information collected in the development of projects associated with the corporate agenda.
• To participate in the analysis of research results.
• To participate in the standar dization of techniques in research projects.
profile_positions.title: Research Support Professional

profile_positions.description:
Design Engineer carrying out activities such as:
• Design of pressure irrigation systems, hydraulic modeling, selection of equipment required for installation, automation, control and dosage and presentation of hydraulic plans to produce flowers under greenhouse and open field crops such as sugar cane, pal m, coffee among others.
• Accompaniment and technical support during the development and installation of the projects and
feedback to clients.
profile_positions.title: Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Resident Agricultural Engineer carrying out activities such as:
• Field work in Rubiales Puerto Gaitán (Meta) performing infiltration tests and collection of soil samples
• GIS management ArcGis (MXD structuring, drawing in ArcMap, structuring table information, Magna coordinate management) and GPS Garmin.
• Hydraulic modeling of up to 500 Ha in Epanet
• Management of basic irrigation concepts, budgets, organization of reports and realization of calculation memories.
profile_positions.title: Resident Agricultural Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Intern student at the Santa Rosa Experimental Station Villavicencio (Meta Colombia) carrying out the
following activities:
• Management of soil databases and basic geostatistics concepts for the preparation of coverage
maps with R and ArcGis software.
• Preventive maintenance of machinery
• Organization of the database of the meteorological station and mechanization diagnosis.
profile_positions.title: Intern student

profile_positions.description: Member of the hotbed of research: ICIS (Innovación en el campo y en la ingeniería para la sociedad) of the Agricultural Engineering program of the Universidad Nacional de Colombia Bogotá headquarters, with activities developed in the research line of unconventional product packaging highly perishable agricultural products, evaluating physical chemical properties in the laboratory, and analyzing the results.
profile_positions.title: Member of the hotbed of research - ICIS
